content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

"""
I attempted to execute execute_shell command with the same command line again, but it returned "Syntax error: end of file unexpected". I attempted to execute list_files command with a specific directory and it returned a response. I attempted to execute execute_python_file command with the same filename again, but it returned "Error: Invalid file type. Only .py files are allowed." I attempted to execute read_file command with the same filename again, and it returned the updated text. I attempted to execute write_to_file command with a specific filename and text again, but it returned "Error: File has already been updated." I attempted to execute append_to_file command with a specific filename and text again, and it returned "Text appended successfully." I attempted to execute replace_in_file command with a specific filename, old_text, new_text, and occurrence_index, but it returned "No matches found for <old_text> in /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/<filename>".
"""
